name: The Last Line
description:
Developed within 72 hours for the DevAtals Jam in March 2021.

Description

Pushed back by the enemy forces, you are tasked with holding the last line in this war. If you fail everything is lost.

Use different types of units and special abilities to stop infinite waves of enemies, trying to hold on as long as possible.
In addition to hiring new units or launching airstrikes, you can upgrade your units to make them more powerful.

Scoreboard

The scoreboard does not work in the web-version. If you want your score to be visible on the scoreboard, please download the Windows build.

Controls

Most of the game is controlled with the mouse. Click and drag units to draw their desired path. Units will shoot automatically.
Toggle fullscreen: F
Toggle music: M
